vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Arvad(?) of the Canaanites, first mentioned at Gen.10.18; descended from Canaan (H3667); along with Sidon (H6721), Heth (H2845), Jebusite (H2983), Amorite (H0567), Girgashite (H1622), Hivite (H2340), Arkite (H6208), Sinite (H5513), Zemarite (H6786) and Hamathite (H2577)
§ Arvadites = "I shall break loose"
the descendants of Arvad, a son of Canaan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: habitante de Arvad; descendiente de Canaán
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞瓦底人 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 "我將釋放"
迦南的兒子亞瓦底的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚瓦底人 这个形容词在原文的意思是 "我将释放"
迦南的儿子亚瓦底的后裔
